LLM Hosting Module¶

Flask + tiny local LLM standardizer with incremental JSONL CLI output.

This module exposes an HTTP API and CLI that standardize program/university names using a tiny local LLM, with deterministic fallbacks when needed.

src.llm_hosting.app.health() → Any¶

Simple liveness check.

Returns:

JSON response {"ok": True}.

src.llm_hosting.app.standardize() → Any¶

Standardize rows from an HTTP request and return JSON.

Returns:

JSON response with standardized rows.
